label: logicA:healthcare_en
steps: [1] If a patient meets sepsis criteria, then broad-spectrum antibiotics are considered.
[2] If broad-spectrum antibiotics are considered for a patient, then blood cultures are drawn before the first dose.
[3] For every patient x, if x has a documented severe penicillin allergy, then x must avoid penicillin.
[4] Patient a has a documented severe penicillin allergy.
[6] Therefore, broad-spectrum antibiotics are considered for patient a.
[7] Therefore, blood cultures are drawn before the first antibiotic dose for patient a.
[8] Therefore, patient a must avoid penicillin.
[9] Blood cultures are drawn and patient a must avoid penicillin.
